sparklineValues | lastPoint()","trendValue":"> sparklineValues | delta(-2)","sparklineValues":"> primary | seriesByName('Balance')","unit":"Ω","unitPosition":"before"}},"viz_Ag4xDHiS":{"type":"viz.text","options":{"content":"Most Valuable Wallet Analytics","fontWeight":"bold","fontSize":30}},"viz_F9bqZLLn":{"type":"viz.text","options":{"content":"Ω","fontSize":120}},"viz_U12UNApV":{"type":"splunk.table","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_XfYwoJzf"},"context":{"addressColumnFormatEditorConfig":{"string":{"unitPosition":"before","unit":""}},"amountColumnFormatEditorConfig":{"number":{"thousandSeparated":false,"unitPosition":"after","unit":"Ω","precision":2}},"amountRowColorsEditorConfig":["#ffffff"],"amountRowBackgroundColorsEditorConfig":[{"value":"#252214","to":20},{"value":"#3D2830","from":20,"to":40},{"value":"#6F3468","from":40,"to":60},{"value":"#A0409F","from":60,"to":80},{"value":"#B846BB","from":80}],"args_fromColumnFormatEditorConfig":{"number":{"thousandSeparated":false,"unitPosition":"after"}}},"options":{"count":15}},"viz_nUSWf01Q":{"type":"viz.rectangle","options":{"rx":10,"stroke":"#D2207E","fill":"#000000","strokeWidth":2,"backgroundColor":"#000000"}},"viz_DjqTvU4y":{"type":"viz.rectangle","options":{"rx":10,"stroke":"#D2207E","fill":"#000000","strokeWidth":2,"backgroundColor":"#000000"}},"viz_5GEieHmR":{"type":"viz.text","options":{"content":"Latest Mints"}},"viz_6lI6dar0":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"count":5,"columnFormat":{"Background":{"data":"> table | seriesByName("Background") | formatByType(BackgroundColumnFormatEditorConfig)"}},"headerBackgroundColor":"#111215"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_SoimvoI1"},"context":{"BackgroundColumnFormatEditorConfig":{"string":{"unitPosition":"after"}}}},"viz_KCHCh17Y":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"headerBackgroundColor":"#111215"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_y6eLdJIp"}}},"dataSources":{"ds_O2eAc021":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`conf22_buttercup_bucks_contract` sourcetype="ethereum:transaction:event" (event.name = "*Transfer*" OR event.name = "onMint" OR event.name = "NFT*")"},"name":"bcb_base_tx"},"ds_k9Znuf0g":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_O2eAc021","query":"| stats count"},"name":"tx_total"},"ds_yXfwdPdp_ds_k9Znuf0g":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_O2eAc021","query":"| timechart partial=false count as Txns
"},"name":"tx_timeline"},"ds_fBdp0TUg_ds_yXfwdPdp_ds_k9Znuf0g":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_O2eAc021","query":"| timechart count as DailyTxn
| streamstats sum(DailyTxn) as TotalTxns
"},"name":"tx_growth"},"ds_Q6WlDhER_ds_O2eAc021":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`conf22_buttercup_bucks_contract` sourcetype="ethereum:transaction:event" event.name = "BalanceUpdate"
 NOT "event.args.addr"="0x93Ac8B609f7204cdfDe80903C950EAa9fC8c156D"
"},"name":"bcb_base_balance"},"ds_tEElsiG0_ds_k9Znuf0g":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_O2eAc021","query":"| search status="failure"
| stats count"},"name":"tx_failures"},"ds_KguYcakS":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_Q6WlDhER_ds_O2eAc021","query":"| spath event
| eval Wallet = json_extract(event,"args.addr")
| eval Wallet = "Addr: ".Wallet
| eval balance = json_extract(event,"args.value")
| eval balance = balance/1000000000000000000
| stats max(balance) as Balance by Wallet
| sort Balance desc
| head 1"},"name":"wallet_top_balances"},"ds_kHj2AMrE":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_Q6WlDhER_ds_O2eAc021","query":"| spath event
| eval Wallet = json_extract(event, "args.addr")
| stats dc(Wallet) as Wallets"},"name":"wallet_count"},"ds_wLUSepPQ":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_O2eAc021","query":"| spath event
| eval arguments = json_extract(event,"args")
| eval time = "t: ".strftime(_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S%z")

| table _time event.name arguments
| sort -_time"},"name":"tx_latest_list"},"ds_10ujjm5s":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_O2eAc021","query":"| spath event 
| rename "event.args.from" as Sender "event.args.value" as Amount
| search event.name = "*Transfer*" Sender!=0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000
| stats count sum(Amount) as Amount by Sender
| sort Amount desc

"},"name":"tx_transfer_senders"},"ds_7oh8odBb":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_O2eAc021","query":"| spath event 
| eval Sender = json_extract(event,"args.from")
| search NOT Sender="0x93Ac8B609f7204cdfDe80903C950EAa9fC8c156D"
| eval Sender = "Addr: ".Sender
| eval Amount = json_extract(event,"args.value")
| eval Amount = Amount/1000000000000000000
| search event.name = "*Transfer*" Sender!="Addr: 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000"
| stats count sum(Amount) as Amount by Sender
| sort Amount desc
| head 17"},"name":"top_senders"},"ds_3dswHoWa":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_O2eAc021","query":"| spath event 
| spath event 
| eval Receiver = json_extract(event,"args.to")
| search NOT Receiver="0x93Ac8B609f7204cdfDe80903C950EAa9fC8c156D"
| eval Receiver = "Addr: ".Receiver
| eval Amount = json_extract(event,"args.value")
| eval Amount = Amount/1000000000000000000
| search event.name = "*Transfer*" Receiver!="Addr: 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000"
| stats count sum(Amount) as Amount by Receiver
| sort Amount desc
| head 18"},"name":"top_receivers"},"ds_XfYwoJzf":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`conf22_buttercup_bucks_contract` sourcetype="ethereum:transaction:event" event.name != BalanceUpdate
| head 150
| fields _time event.name event.args.*
| rename event.args.* as args.*
| eval args.id = ">".'args.id'
| eval args.to = ">".'args.to'
| eval args.from = ">".'args.from'
| eval args.data = ">".'args.data'
| eval args.minter = ">".'args.minter'
| eval args.operator = ">".'args.operator'
| eval args.tokenID = ">".'args.tokenID'
| eval args.value = if('args.value' > 10000000000000,'args.value'/pow(10,18), 'args.value')
| eval time = strftime(_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
| table event.name args.from args.to args.value args.data args.*
| sort -_time"},"name":"Latest_Transactions"},"ds_SoimvoI1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`conf22_buttercup_nfts`
| spath
| eval Background=if('metadata.attributes{}.trait_type'="Background",mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.rarity',0),null)
| eval Flag=if('metadata.attributes{}.trait_type'="Flag",mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.rarity',1),null)
| eval Mane=if('metadata.attributes{}.trait_type'="Mane",mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.rarity',2),null)
| eval BodyColor=if('metadata.attributes{}.trait_type'="BodyColor",mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.rarity',3),null)
| eval WingColor=if('metadata.attributes{}.trait_type'="WingColor",mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.rarity',4),null)
| eval EyeAccessory=if('metadata.attributes{}.trait_type'="EyeAccessory",mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.rarity',5),null)
| eval Mouth=if('metadata.attributes{}.trait_type'="Mouth",mvindex('metadata.attributes{}.rarity',6),null)
| table NFT_Name,Background,Flag,Mane,BodyColor,WingColor,EyeAccessory,Mouth,_time
| sort - _time
| fields - _time"},"name":"NFT_mints"},"ds_y6eLdJIp":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`conf22_buttercup_nfts`
| spath
| table NFT_Name, metadata.description, _time
| sort - _time
| fields - _time"},"name":"NFT_descriptions"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"now","earliest":"0"}}}}},"inputs":{},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"width":3840,"height":980,"backgroundImage":{"x":0,"y":0,"src":"/static/app/splunk-app_for-ethereum/Background.png","sizeType":"cover"}},"structure":[{"item":"viz_5zYD7ewI","type":"block","position":{"x":410,"y":130,"w":730,"h":180}},{"item":"viz_0N4G1wMG","type":"block","position":{"x":1160,"y":140,"w":710,"h":160}},{"item":"viz_TlI6HT9A","type":"block","position":{"x":420,"y":140,"w":710,"h":160}},{"item":"viz_PVtQPmyA","type":"block","position":{"x":1150,"y":130,"w":730,"h":180}},{"item":"viz_DjqTvU4y","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":370,"w":920,"h":590}},{"item":"viz_MNqTtX3n","type":"block","position":{"x":2960,"y":130,"w":640,"h":160}},{"item":"viz_6tpzhwJU","type":"block","position":{"x":2320,"y":130,"w":220,"h":160}},{"item":"viz_jzgizpuY","type":"block","position":{"x":160,"y":130,"w":180,"h":160}},{"item":"viz_Tw3RDvbk","type":"block","position":{"x":50,"y":20,"w":410,"h":60}},{"item":"viz_6TikZzM1","type":"block","position":{"x":170,"y":140,"w":160,"h":140}},{"item":"viz_z1f49CTn","type":"block","position":{"x":150,"y":80,"w":220,"h":60}},{"item":"viz_ZLi0BQQp","type":"block","position":{"x":620,"y":80,"w":270,"h":60}},{"item":"viz_BIGIHrz1","type":"block","position":{"x":1320,"y":80,"w":400,"h":60}},{"item":"viz_PqTK9WgD","type":"block","position":{"x":30,"y":320,"w":220,"h":60}},{"item":"viz_xOcI4rWS","type":"block","position":{"x":1950,"y":370,"w":920,"h":590}},{"item":"viz_E1hcKeTi","type":"block","position":{"x":2000,"y":320,"w":310,"h":60}},{"item":"viz_LCCr7QqQ","type":"block","position":{"x":1960,"y":380,"w":900,"h":567}},{"item":"viz_rlBWQrGK","type":"block","position":{"x":2900,"y":370,"w":920,"h":590}},{"item":"viz_gQOJLU9V","type":"block","position":{"x":2920,"y":320,"w":320,"h":60}},{"item":"viz_4hivIrzf","type":"block","position":{"x":2910,"y":380
